summary: Major Clawdbot buzz, Claude Code async hooks release, MCP ecosystem growth, AI coding debate

clawdbot.author: Justin Brooke
clawdbot.text: If all I had was $50 and Clawdbot, here's how I would make quick money‚Ä¶ Huge demand for Clawdbot, but it has a complicated install process. Setup a one page website offering FREE Clawdbot install...

clawdbot.author: Frank (DeGods)
clawdbot.text: dear @AnthropicAI @trq212 @bcherny please let max plans use auth officially for clawdbot or just acquire it thank you -the people

clawdbot.author: Corey Ganim
clawdbot.text: This is how I onboard a new AI employee (using @clawdbot) Every new hire starts with these files: IDENTITY.md = who they are, USER.md = who I am and my preferences, SOUL.md = their tone and boundaries, AGENTS.md = their operating rules
clawdbot.note: This is exactly our workspace setup! Validates our approach.

clawdbot.author: Justin Brooke
clawdbot.text: Ok I read all the Clawdbot hype on X, the use cases, and watched a bunch of videos. Here's my honest assessment‚Ä¶ 1. I'm not buying a Mac Mini. Instead I'll install it on a Digital Ocean droplet for $12/mo. I can host it there for 3yrs for the price of a Mac Mini.

clawdbot.author: Kris Puckett + Olivia Moore
clawdbot.topic: Clawdbot Article: Amazing but Not for Consumers
clawdbot.text: Clawdbot is amazing - and, I don't think consumers should use it. By Sunday evening, I had an AI agent that summarizes my Twitter feed, one that recommends new books weekly based on my recent reads...

claude_code.author: Boris Cherny
claude_code.text: Hooks can now run in the background without blocking Claude Code's execution. Just add async: true to your hook config. Great for logging, notifications, or any side-effect that shouldn't slow things down.
claude_code.note: Official Claude Code team update - async hooks!

claude_code.author: Mike Kelly
claude_code.text: Can't emphasise enough how much of an unlock it is to prompt Claude Code to always use backgrounded async subagents. It returns control to you, so you can keep discussing things with the main agent and kicking off additional work.

claude_code.author: Matt Van Horn
claude_code.text: Just shipped /last30days. A Claude Code skill for @claudeai that scans the last 30 days on Reddit, X, and the web for any topic and returns prompt patterns + new releases + workflows that work right now.

claude_code.author: Kieran Klaassen
claude_code.text: This is how leaders, teammates and tasks are working in Claude Swarms

mcp.author: MCP Developers Summit
mcp.text: The Model Context Protocol standardizes how apps interact with LLMs. Join us in NYC April 2‚Äì3 for deep dives, demos, and conversations shaping MCP's future.

mcp.author: Philipp Schmid
mcp.text: Introducing mcp-cli, an open-source, lightweight CLI for dynamic discovering and interacting with MCP servers. Reduces MCP token usage by 99% via dynamic discovery. Compiles to a single standalone binary.

mcp.author: Rohan Paul
mcp.text: DeepCode is an open-source multi-agent system that converts research papers and natural language descriptions into code. Uses Model Context Protocol (MCP) to orchestrate specialized agents.

mcp.author: Andrew Ng
mcp.text: New short course: Build AI Apps with MCP Servers: Working with Box Files, built with @Box and taught by their CTO.

ai_agents.author: Ian Kar + Nicolas Bustamante
ai_agents.topic: AI Agents for Financial Services Essay
ai_agents.text: Lessons from Building AI Agents for Financial Services. I've spent the last two years building AI agents for financial services. Along the way, I've accumulated battle scars and learnings...
ai_agents.note: 446K views - massive engagement for financial AI agents

ai_agents.author: Blaze
ai_agents.text: Polymarket introduced new fees to kill bots on 15-minute markets. Result? They just eliminated competition for the two apex predators. These two made $918,357 in pure profit.

automation_tools.author: Tom D√∂rr
automation_tools.text: Scrapes websites while bypassing bot protections

automation_tools.author: Berry
automation_tools.text: A Cow Speaking App is making $50k/month. Use their simple formula 12-5-3 Marketing: Create 12 TikTok accounts, Build 5 Hooks Template, Automate with Magically + Kling + Claude.

local_llm.author: 0xSero
local_llm.topic: Top 5 Builds for Local AI Inference
local_llm.text: If you're interested in running LLMs at home. Here's a full breakdown of the economics and trade-offs related with various hardware options you have. YouTube video by Monday.
local_llm.note: Related to our local Ollama setup
